name: vue-papercups
description: A Vue 3 component for Papercups chat

scripts.deploy:patch: npm run lint && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run lint && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm run lint && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push

author: Viesturs Marnauza
